tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages
type: Tutorial Step - Chronology of a Position

definition.text: Let's take a few minutes to dissect this position, looking particularly into what makes each stage tick...

paragraphs.text: Trigger Stage: Opens on Feb 17th at 0 hs because the 24H Bollinger SubChannel turned Down and not Side. Go check if that is the case! The stage closes on Feb 28th at 9 hs, after the second breakdown triggers the take position event.
Open Stage: Opens when the trigger stage closes, and closes one hour later (!?) after the market sell order is placed.
One hour later? Yes! Remember we are running the simulation on the 1H time frame! We'll discuss this matter in depth later on!
